title: Everybody Hates Me
lyrics:
Up in my head
I'm the only one around
’Cause somehow
Everybody hates me now
The sky seems clear

But I can only see the clouds



'Cause somehow

Everybody hates me now



I've over-extended

Replaced all of my friends with

Linen sheets, a takeaway box

And an incomplete crossword book

With nothing left to show for it

She’s sleeping on a sofa

Acts like she doesn't know that I exist



Everybody hates me now

Everybody hates me now

Everybody hates me now
